newsitem.title: JAPAN: Eisai shares bid-only on upgrading.
newsitem.headline: Eisai shares bid-only on upgrading.

text.p: Shares of Eisai Co Ltd were bid-only on Friday morning, supported by news that Nomura Securities Co Ltd had upgraded the firm to a "1" from its previous "2", traders said.
At 0037 GMT, the share price of the leading pharmeceutical producer was bid-only at 2,290 yen, against Thursday's close of 2,210 yen.
Nomura later said it had raised the rating due to Eisai's expected strong earnings growth.

In its three-grade rating system, Nomura assigns a "1" rating to issues whose values it expects will outperform the key 225-share Nikkei average by more than 10 percentage points over the following six months.
